description:
Rei challenges Raoh, but Raoh`s fighting spirit alone overwhelms him. Raoh defeats Rei with a single finger, without ever dismounting from his steed, Kokuoh.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entre la vie et la mort
Nanto Suichouken Shi no Mai! Ai no Tame Ore no Inochi Kurete Yarou!!
The South Star Waterfowl Fist`s Dance of Death! I`ll Give My Life for Love!!
南斗水鳥拳死の舞! 愛のためオレの命くれてやろう!!
